summary: I’ve been trying to work with Chris Bachalo since I started writing comics (maybe in sons say since I started READING them) and...
body:
KELLY THOMPSON on Twitter

I’ve been trying to work with Chris Bachalo since I started writing comics (maybe in sons say since I started READING them) and I just couldn’t be more delighted with this stunning variant cover he did for Captain Marvel #2.


It’s honestly my everything right now!😍😍😍


Captain Marvel #1 begins 1/9/19 and you can find this variant in February!

blog.name: marvelousguru
blog.title: Marvelous Guru
blog.description: Make Mine Marvel! The Marvelous Guru shares new and vintage Marvel-related merch. Sales, deals, auctions, retrospectives, and all the latest news on Marvel toys, tees, fashion, games, and more.

summary: It’s the end of the year, so get ready for a 2019 filled to the brim with new Marvel product as Captain Marvel, Avengers:...
body:
It’s the end of the year, so get ready for a 2019 filled to the brim with new Marvel product as Captain Marvel, Avengers: Endgame, and more come to a theater near you! Plus Marvel Comics are heating up with a new event ‘War of the Realms’ that is sure to heat things up on the Asgardian side of things.

Welcome to the last Marvelous Monday of the year! Here are some fantastic finds.

We Are Groot

The lovable anthropomorphic tree known as Groot as some stylish new product.

Infinity War and Endgame

The Avengers are in the endgame now, and there’s some great new figs, stylish jewelry, and a bunch of colorful concept art that’ll be appearing on tees arriving in our very near future.

And More!

Logos show your team affiliation, so check out the Captain marvel tee, the Punisher logo dog toy, or an exclusive pin set featuring Ant-Man’s Pym Particle design. And if you’re flush with cash from a big casino win or a bank heist (hey, maybe your villain after all!), check out the Legacy Replica 1:4 Scale HULK!

That’s it for 2018! We’ll see you tomorrow for the very first Review Roundup of the year, and then we’ve got a review of my Marvel Unlimited experience coming later in the week!

If you enjoyed this article, please comment, like, and share!

You can subscribe to get notified of future articles by throwing your email into the Subscribe Via Email box. Send feedback and connect with me — Tim Bannock, A.K.A. the Marvelous Guru — on Tumblr, Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook.

Marvelous Monday 12/31/2018: Groot, Avengers Endgame, and Logos Galore! #marvel #marvelmerch #groot #avengers #punisher #captainmarvel #marvelousmonday #marvelousguru It’s the end of the year, so get ready for a 2019 filled to the brim with new Marvel product as Captain Marvel, Avengers: Endgame, and more come to a theater near you!

summary: Captain Marvel - Un nuovo spot ed un infuocato mostion poster
title: Captain Marvel - Un nuovo spot ed un infuocato mostion poster
body:
#CaptainMarvel - Un nuovo spot ed un infuocato mostion poster

I Marvel Studios hanno rilasciato in queste ore due nuovi contenuti promozionali dedicati a Captain Marvel, il prossimo capitolo dell’immenso Marvel Cinematic Universe.

Con il terzo spot rilasciato via Youtube, i Marvel Studios hanno twittato anche un infuocato motion poster.

Captain Marvel è diretto da Anna Boden e Ryan Fleck. La sceneggiatura è di Ginevra Robertson-Dworet e Nicole…

summary: .I have absolutely nothing against Brie Larson, i think she's awesome, but i do believe that Miranda Otto would had made an...
body: .I have absolutely nothing against Brie Larson, i think she’s awesome, but i do believe that Miranda Otto would had made an fabulous Captain Marvel. Plus we would’ve seen Iron Man and Eowyn fight together on screen, but hopefully Miranda and Bobby D will work together in the future (it’s my biggest wish, well after Peace in Yemen and overall political stability of course).

reblog.comment: .I have absolutely nothing against Brie Larson, i think she’s awesome, but i do believe that Miranda Otto would had made an fabulous Captain Marvel. Plus we would’ve seen Iron Man and Eowyn fight together on screen, but hopefully Miranda and Bobby D will work together in the future (it’s my biggest wish, well after Peace in Yemen and overall political stability of course).

Plus we would’ve seen Iron Man and Eowyn fight together on screen, but hopefully Miranda and Bobby D will work together in the future (it’s my biggest wish, well after Peace in Yemen and overall political stability of course).

Plus we would’ve seen Iron Man and Eowyn fight together on screen, but hopefully Miranda and Bobby D will work together in the future (it’s my biggest wish, well after Peace in Yemen and overall political stability of course).

summary: My ten most anticipated films of 2018... though it would be just as accurate to follow Cosma’s example and make all ten...
caption:
My ten most anticipated films of 2018… though it would be just as accurate to follow Cosma’s example and make all ten different Godzilla: King of the Monsters posters.

I was as surprised as you to find Alita: Battle Angel on this list, but hey, it’s a live-action movie that was actually filmed in 3D, and I can dodge the dreaded 3D price hike by watching it for free at work. (The last two “real” 3D Hollywood blockbusters were Transformers: The Last Knight and X-Men: Apocalypse, if you can believe it.) That’s a hair more appealing to me than the cascade of probably-unnecessary sequels to movies I love.

summary: In the spirit of Michael B. Jordan and Henry Cavill playing against type by being cast as the main villain, contrasting their...
body:
In the spirit of Michael B. Jordan and Henry Cavill playing against type by being cast as the main villain, contrasting their “good guy” image, I propose this:

For Captain Marvel 2, Emma Watson as main villain Karla Sofen aka Moonstone aka Dark Captain Marvel. Emma’s got it in her to play the baddie, just watch Bling Ring.

reblog.comment:
In the spirit of Michael B. Jordan and Henry Cavill playing against type by being cast as the main villain, contrasting their “good guy” image, I propose this:

For Captain Marvel 2, Emma Watson as main villain Karla Sofen aka Moonstone aka Dark Captain Marvel. Emma’s got it in her to play the baddie, just watch Bling Ring.

blog.name: scottishaccentsareawesome
blog.title: *Cue "Boys of Summer" Intro...*
blog.description: She/Her! MCU-addict (specializes in loving Tony Stark and the Stark Family, including but not limited to IronDad & Spider-Son and Pepperony)! Loves Harringrove and Stranger Things but doesn't have Netflix (figure that one out)! Loves Dean WInchester, Brooke Davis, Tony Dinozzo, Jake Peralta, Tahani Al Jamil, The Doctor, Han Solo, Jim Kirk, Kara Danvers, Barry Allen, and MOST of the characters that come with all of them!

summary: (When Carol/Captain Marvel and Nick Fury reunite in “Avengers: Endgame”...) Fury: it really is you! You seem hardly to have aged...
body:
(When Carol/Captain Marvel and Nick Fury reunite in “Avengers: Endgame”…)

Fury: it really is you! You seem hardly to have aged at all!

Carol: *Really*?! How incredibly rude! One *never* discusses a woman’s age, Nick. Would have hoped I taught you better.
